thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 21 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sichuan Golden Summit (Group) Joint-stock to swing to profit in FY 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sichuan Golden Summit (Group) Joint-stock to swing to profit in FY 2017

organizations.name: sichuan golden summit (group) joint-stock co ltd

text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Sichuan Golden Summit (Group) Joint-stock Co Ltd :
* Sees to swing to net profit at 25 million yuan to 29 million yuan in FY 2017 versus net loss at 28.2 million yuan year ago
* Says increased sale price and production volume of calcium oxide as main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/W49k5D
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
